response:
MRI is the gold standard to visualize the brainstem lesion and differentiate between demyelination, tumour, and other structural causes. Blood tests are essential to screen for autoimmune markers, mimics, and baseline metabolic function before treatment. Lumbar puncture is indicated to confirm inflammation (oligoclonal bands) or exclude infection.
